item.title: Ninja Warriors Meta launches second presale ahead of Full Gameplay Release in Q4 2023
item.dc:creator: Adrian Barkley
item.description:
The highly anticipated full launch of the Ninja Warriors Meta blockchain game is set to take place in Q4 2023. 

However, before this groundbreaking release, the platform launched its second presale, where for every USDT invested, the user receives 66.6666667 NWT. NWT is the native token of the Ninja Warriors Meta gaming platform.

Ninja Warriors Meta's Presale 

In line with the project's roadmap, the NWT presale is already underway before the full launch of Ninja Warrior Meta's blockchain gaming platform. 

The NWT token is the native token and core of the Ninja Warrior Meta ecosystem. Thus, the presale allows gamers to acquire NWT tokens at a discounted price before the general publicif they intend to fully participate in the full game mode upon launch at the end of 2023. 

The minimum investment amount is 100 USDT, while whales can only buy a maximum of 100,000 USDT. All investors must submit personal details as part of the know-your-customer (KYC) procedure.

It would also allow gamers and investors to enjoy a share in future developments, enhanced gameplay, immersive game modes, rewards, and an expanded gaming ecosystem.

The roadmap showcases a clear vision for exponential growth, and the team behind Ninja Warriors Meta is committed to continuous development and strategic partnerships with industry leaders.

To fund the project's roadmap and ensure widespread adoption and awareness, the NWT presale allows Ninja Warrior Meta to run a dedicated branding phase utilizing organic traffic generation on social media platforms. 

The focus would be expanding the Ninja Warrior Meta community, including captivating press releases, team interviews, and strategic campaigns.

The presale goes beyond promoting the Ninja Warrior Meta blockchain game through engaging storytelling and content like videos and gameplay showcases. 

Notably, it facilitates gathering like-minded crypto game participants, influential figures, and investors, immersing them in Ninja Warriors Meta.

Moreover,  Ninja Warriors Meta is set to release a move-to-earn (M2E) application for Android and iOS platforms in two months. This application offers users the opportunity to accumulate points through physical activities, including gym visits and diverse movements. These points can be exchanged for DBUSD tokens.

Full-game Launch

Amid the ongoing NWT presale, since Q3 2022, gaming enthusiasts have been eagerly awaiting the announcement of Ninja Warriors Meta's full-game platform. The game is set for launch in Q4 2023.

ü§©Exciting things are coming! Get ready for the full launch of the Ninja Warriors #NFT game in Q4 2023 üöÄFollow us on Discord to stay updated on NFT drops, token sales, and other upcoming milestones ‚§µÔ∏èüîóhttps://t.co/wdAJqPD6rF pic.twitter.com/7Q5dQNvfy3

— Ninja Warriors (@NinjaWOfficial) June 6, 2023

Players would need to get a Ninja Warriors membership to fully participate in all game modes. 

Players that obtain a low-cost monthly subscription are set to receive a free non-fungible token (NFT) character that allows its owner to enter the Ninja Warrior Meta ecosystem and start playing, earning, and progressing. 

Since the Ninja Warrior Meta game would launch on Polygon's layer-2 blockchain, players would also need to set up a MATIC-compatible wallet and fund said wallet with sufficient MATIC for transaction gas fees.

Players would also expect to earn as they play, covering whatever initial costs were incurred during gameplay. For that reason, Ninja Warriors Meta incorporates an in-game rewards system designed to be fair and sustainable.

Conclusion

The presale launch would position Ninja Warrior Meta as a worthy player in the blockchain gaming industry by funding its growth, continuous development, and strategic partnerships necessary for the game to flourish.

With its focus on blockchain technology and the potential of play-to-earn gaming, Ninja Warriors Meta's full-game launch would captivate individuals, enticing them to join the revolutionary blockchain gaming experience.

Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice.

item.title: Tether Mints 1 Billion of USDT on Ethereum, Tradecurve Price Set To Reach $0.018
item.dc:creator: Crypto Daily
item.description:
Tether, the issuer of USDT, the world’s largest stablecoin, has minted the second 1 billion token on the Ethereum blockchain in less than two months. 

The stablecoin issuer has said that the new mint is part of its "inventory replenish" program to ensure stablecoin liquidity across all chains. In other crypto developments, Tradecurve has been building momentum as investors flock to the new trading platform that has the potential to rekindle interest in the DeFi space.

Tether Mints Additional 1 Billion USDT

Tether’s treasury has announced the minting of 1 billion USDT tokens on the Ethereum blockchain just two months after a separate 1 billion USDT token was minted. So far in 2023, the stablecoin issuer has now minted over $16 billion worth of USDT tokens. Tether remains the most dominant USD-pegged stablecoin with a market cap of $83 billion. 

 

 

Announcing the latest mint, Tether’s CTO Paolo Ardoino, explained that the tokens were minted for chain swap and not due to a rising interest in the purchase of digital assets. Chain swap refers to the process of sending digital assets (in this case USDT) from one blockchain network to another – bridging assets across multiple blockchains.

After the mint, on-chain data showed that Tether’s Treasury sent $750 million worth of USDT in a chain swap transaction to Binance. According to Arkham Intelligence, the popular blockchain analytical firm, the Tether Treasury sent the funds in three separate batches of $250 million transactions after an initial $10 test transaction. 

 

The analytical firm later reported that of the $1 billion new tokens minted, only $146 million remains on the Ethereum blockchain as the others have been swapped for USDT on other chains. 

Tradecurve (TCRV) Price Set to Hit $0.018

Along with the increasing dominance of Tether in the stablecoin sectors, Tradecurve has enjoyed increasing attention in the decentralized finance (DeFi) space. Tradecurve is building the first DeFi platform where its users will have the opportunity to trade both cryptocurrencies and derivatives (like stocks, forex, options, and commodities) from a single account.

Experts are bullish that the price of Tradecurve (TCRV) could easily jump above its current $0.018 price because of the magnitude of the derivatives markets. The Bank for International Settlements reports that in June 2022, the over-the-counter (OTC) derivatives market rose to $632 trillion. 

The bullish predictions for the price of Tradecurve come from the platform’s potential to connect the crypto market with the global derivatives market.

Experts believe the Tradecurve platform could rekindle interest in the DeFi space as crypto traders would no longer need to open more than one account to trade global financial instruments. As more traders enter into the Tradecurve ecosystem, experts predict that the price of TCRV could jump from $0.018 to as high as $1.5 by the end of 2023.

For more information about the Tradecurve presale:

Click Here To Buy TCRV Presale Tokens

Follow Us Twitter

Join Our Community on Telegram

Disclaimer: This is a sponsored press release and is for informational purposes only. It does not reflect the views of Crypto Daily, nor is it intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, or financial advice.

item.title: Reports Indicate Venezuela Might Shut Down Its National Crypto
item.dc:creator: Jana Serfontein
item.description:
Reports indicate that the Venezuelan government may be shutting down its national cryptocurrency, the petro.

The government of Venezuela could be winding down its petro cryptocurrency after members of Sunacrip, the country’s crypto watchdog, were found to be involved in a corruption scheme.

Reports by Bloomberg Linea indicate that it could be the end of Venezuela’s national oil-backed cryptocurrency, the petro. Three persons linked with the country’s crypto regulator said the petro would be liquidated five years after issuance.

Bitcoin.com first shared the news and reported that the decision was made as part of Sunacrip’s restructuring. The decision reportedly also includes liquidating the debts contracted with big petro holders, including department stores that decided to accept petro as a payment method.

The decision to restructure Sunacrip came after its head Joselit Ramirez was arrested in March on corruption charges. Venezuelan president Nicolas Madura removed Ramirez from his position for allegedly participating in a plan to steal from the country’s oil operations.

Soon after news of Ramirez’s alleged involvement in corruption came to light, energy suppliers across the country shut down various crypto-mining operations. Local media reports and tweets from Venezuela’s National Association of Cryptocurrencies indicate that crypto mining facilities were shut down in the states of Carabobo, Bolivar, and Lara. Numerous crypto exchanges were also ordered to cease their activities. 

The petro was introduced in 2018 as a way to sidestep sanctions imposed by the Trump and Obama administrations and has largely been viewed as a failure. The introduction of an oil-backed national crypto was met with scepticism from global leaders, and former US president Donald Trump banned US investors from trading in petro.

Introduced amid a financial crisis, Venezuela no longer lists the petro as a currency. When introducing the petro, the Maduro administration permitted several crypto exchanges to operate in the country, introducing Venezuelans to cryptocurrencies as an alternative to their declining currency.

Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice.

item.title: Do Kwon Sentenced to Four Months in a Montenegro Jail
item.dc:creator: Jana Serfontein
item.description:
Do Kwon has been sentenced to four months in jail by a Montenegro district court for forging travel documents.

Bloomberg reports that a Montenegrin Basic Court in the country’s capital of Podgorica sentenced Do Kwon and his associate Han Chang-Joon to four months in jail for forging travel documents. The infamous co-founder of the collapsed Terraform Labs was arrested in March in Podgorica, where he was found attempting to travel to Dubai with a forged passport.

Kwon and Joon were found guilty of forgery charges, and two Costa Rican and Belgian passports and two identity cards belonging to Kwon and Joon were confiscated. A Basic Court in Podgorica shared the verdict on Monday and said the pair’s time spent in detention would be included in their sentence.

The duo have been in custody despite being released on bail early in June.

Do Kwon: An Internationally Wanted Man

Kwon is a South Korean national who stands accused on charges of multibillion-dollar fraud related to the collapse of the Terra ecosystem in May 2022. Terraform’s algorithmic stablecoin and crypto project Terra-Luna collapsed, wiping out $40 billion in market cap and sending the overall crypto market into a spiral.

Following Terra’s collapse, South Korean authorities charged Kwon in September for violating its Capital Markets Act and issued a warrant for his arrest.

The International Criminal Police Organisation (Interpol) accordingly issued a red notice for Kwon, signalling international law enforcement agencies to track him down and arrest him on charges of fraud.

US Federal prosecutors further indicted Kwon with two counts each of securities fraud, wire fraud, commodities fraud, and conspiracy.

Both South Korea and the US are seeking Kwon’s extradition.

Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice.

item.title: Discover the Easiest Way to Generate Passive Income With Fancy Crypto
item.dc:creator: Crypto Daily
item.description:
Finding a reliable and profitable investment opportunity in these challenging economic times can be quite daunting. However, there is one sector that has been consistently gaining attention and attracting individuals looking for swift passive income: cryptocurrency mining. Thanks to FancyCrypto, the game is changing, making it easier than ever for anyone to enter the world of cloud mining and start earning. Fancy Crypto is revolutionizing how users access cloud mining, eliminating the need for expensive hardware or technical expertise. With over 360,000 satisfied users worldwide, Fancy Crypto has earned a reputation as a trustworthy provider of hash rates. This post has informative content about generating passive income with fancy crypto mining.

Why Has Crypto Mining Become Taxing for Users?

Traditional crypto mining has become increasingly challenging and expensive for several reasons:

• The cost of mining rigs and associated tools is exorbitant, making it unaffordable for many people. • The energy consumption required for mining is substantial, adding to the expenses. • The process is complicated due to the Proof of Work strategy. • The rising number of mining farms and pools has made crypto mining highly competitive, making it difficult for seasoned miners to complete transactions. How Cloud Mining Offers a Favorable Fortune in Crypto Mining

The good news is that cloud mining has emerged as a favourable alternative for those interested in crypto mining. Even individuals with no prior knowledge or experience in the mining sector can now make surprising progress. Here are a few reasons why crypto mining, especially cloud mining, is gaining popularity:

• Simplicity for All: Cloud mining doesn't require individuals to be mining experts. Anyone can sign up and start earning while learning the nuances of crypto mining. • Hassle-Free Solutions: Platforms like Fancy Crypto offer user-friendly interfaces and handle all your mining requirements. Once you sign up with a registered platform, such as Fancy Crypto, you can easily choose what you want to mine, and the platform handles the rest. • More Time for What Matters: Cloud mining eliminates the need to worry about connectivity and uptime. You can dedicate more time to other important tasks while the platform manages the mining process for you. • Cost-Efficiency: Cloud mining saves you from the expenses associated with traditional mining, such as electricity bills and expensive equipment. Reputed and registered firms like Fancy Crypto handle all aspects of mining, ensuring you receive your fair share of profits. Fancy Crypto: The Leading Platform for Cloud Mining

Regarding cloud mining, Fancy Crypto stands out as a pioneer and leader in the industry. The platform caters to seasoned miners and novice enthusiasts, providing a user-friendly experience. Here's why you should consider shifting to Fancy Crypto:

• Higher Hash Rates: Fancy Crypto offers hash rates between 2 to 10 per cent, surpassing other contenders worldwide. This means you can earn more and maximize your profits. • Hassle-Free Experience: Fancy Crypto's extensive technological expertise ensures users a hassle-free and flawless mining experience. Say goodbye to hidden costs and complicated contracts found on other platforms. • Transparent and Risk-Free: Fancy Crypto provides risk-free and effortless cloud mining contracts. You can easily keep track of your daily earnings, allowing you to focus on accumulating profits. Discover the Profit Packages of Fancy Crypto

Fancy Crypto differentiates itself from other services with its exceptional mining packages and profits. With cutting-edge technology and a user-friendly interface, this platform makes cryptocurrency mining accessible to everyone. Notable packages include:

• Free Cloud Mining: This package allows individuals to start their mining journey with a minimal investment of $10. In return, users can expect a daily return of $0.10. While the returns may seem modest, it allows individuals to dip their toes into mining without a significant upfront investment. • Experience Project Cloud Mining: With this package, individuals can invest $100 for a two-day contract. This contract offers a daily earning of $2.5, providing a more substantial return than the free cloud mining option. The shorter duration of the contract allows for quicker returns, making it attractive for individuals looking for a faster turnaround. • ETH Cloud Mining: Fancy Crypto offers an Ethereum (ETH) cloud mining package. With a contract price of $350, valid for five days, users can earn $5.6 daily. At the end of the contract, the total earnings amount to $28. This package targets individuals interested in mining ETH, one of the leading cryptocurrencies. • LTC Cloud Mining: This package focuses on Litecoin (LTC) mining. For a contract price of $800, valid for ten days, users can earn $29.25 daily. By the end of the contract, the total earnings reach $438. This package appeals to individuals interested in mining LTC, which has gained popularity as a digital currency. • DogeCoin Cloud Mining: Fancy Crypto provides a package dedicated to Dogecoin (Doge) mining. With a contract priced at $1,800 and fifteen days, users can expect to earn $2326 by the end of the contract. This package suits those interested in mining Dogecoin, a cryptocurrency that gained attention for its community-driven nature. • ETC Cloud Mining: This package is tailored for enthusiasts of Ethereum Classic (ETC). For a contract price of $3,000, valid for twenty-eight days, users can earn $64.5 daily. The total earnings at the end of the contract amount to $1806, in addition to recouping the initial investment. This package offers an extended mining period for those interested in ETC. • BTC Cloud Mining: Fancy Crypto's flagship package is designed for Bitcoin (BTC) mining. With a contract price of $5,000 and a duration of fifty-six days, users can earn a daily interest of $117, totaling $6,580, by the end of the contract. As the most prominent and valuable cryptocurrency, BTC mining attracts investors looking for substantial returns.

Additionally, Fancy Crypto offers a referral program that allows users to earn rewards by referring others to the platform. Affiliates receive a 3% commission on the purchase orders made by their referrals, providing an additional opportunity to boost earnings.

The variety of profit packages offered by Fancy Crypto caters to different investment levels and preferences, allowing individuals to choose the option that aligns with their goals and resources. Whether someone is a beginner looking to start with a small investment or an experienced miner targeting specific cryptocurrencies, Fancy Crypto offers a range of options to suit their needs.

Final Words

Despite the challenges associated with traditional mining, cloud mining has emerged as a viable and profitable alternative in recent years. It allows individuals to rent mining hardware from reputable service providers, eliminating the need for costly equipment and high energy costs. Fancy Crypto has made cloud mining accessible to all, providing a user-friendly platform and cutting-edge technology.

If you're looking for a reliable and profitable investment opportunity, Fancy Crypto offers the perfect solution. With its transparent contracts, higher hash rates, and hassle-free experience, you can generate passive income and maximize your profits. Join the thousands of satisfied users who have already discovered the benefits of Fancy Crypto mining.

To learn more about Fancy Crypto and start your cloud mining journey, visit their official website at https://fancycrypto.com. Don't miss out on this opportunity to embrace the world of cryptocurrency mining and secure your financial future.

With a contract price of $350, valid for five days, users can earn $5.6 daily. At the end of the contract, the total earnings amount to $28. This package targets individuals interested in mining ETH, one of the leading cryptocurrencies. • LTC Cloud Mining: This package focuses on Litecoin (LTC) mining. For a contract price of $800, valid for ten days, users can earn $29.25 daily. By the end of the contract, the total earnings reach $438. This package appeals to individuals interested in mining LTC, which has gained popularity as a digital currency. • DogeCoin Cloud Mining: Fancy Crypto provides a package dedicated to Dogecoin (Doge) mining. With a contract priced at $1,800 and fifteen days, users can expect to earn $2326 by the end of the contract. This package suits those interested in mining Dogecoin, a cryptocurrency that gained attention for its community-driven nature. • ETC Cloud Mining: This package is tailored for enthusiasts of Ethereum Classic (ETC). For a contract price of $3,000, valid for twenty-eight days, users can earn $64.5 daily. The total earnings at the end of the contract amount to $1806, in addition to recouping the initial investment. This package offers an extended mining period for those interested in ETC. • BTC Cloud Mining: Fancy Crypto's flagship package is designed for Bitcoin (BTC) mining. With a contract price of $5,000 and a duration of fifty-six days, users can earn a daily interest of $117, totaling $6,580, by the end of the contract. As the most prominent and valuable cryptocurrency, BTC mining attracts investors looking for substantial returns.

Additionally, Fancy Crypto offers a referral program that allows users to earn rewards by referring others to the platform. Affiliates receive a 3% commission on the purchase orders made by their referrals, providing an additional opportunity to boost earnings.

The variety of profit packages offered by Fancy Crypto caters to different investment levels and preferences, allowing individuals to choose the option that aligns with their goals and resources. Whether someone is a beginner looking to start with a small investment or an experienced miner targeting specific cryptocurrencies, Fancy Crypto offers a range of options to suit their needs.

Final Words

Despite the challenges associated with traditional mining, cloud mining has emerged as a viable and profitable alternative in recent years. It allows individuals to rent mining hardware from reputable service providers, eliminating the need for costly equipment and high energy costs. Fancy Crypto has made cloud mining accessible to all, providing a user-friendly platform and cutting-edge technology.

If you're looking for a reliable and profitable investment opportunity, Fancy Crypto offers the perfect solution. With its transparent contracts, higher hash rates, and hassle-free experience, you can generate passive income and maximize your profits. Join the thousands of satisfied users who have already discovered the benefits of Fancy Crypto mining.

To learn more about Fancy Crypto and start your cloud mining journey, visit their official website at https://fancycrypto.com. Don't miss out on this opportunity to embrace the world of cryptocurrency mining and secure your financial future.

item.title: Enya Labs, Core Contributor to Boba Network and Enjinstarter Unveil a Synergistic Partnership to Integrate Services and Fuel Web3 Ecosystem Expansion
item.dc:creator: Crypto Daily
item.description:
Palo Alto, CA, June 19th, 2023, Chainwire

Enya Labs, the core contributor to Boba Network, a multichain layer 2 optimistic rollup solution aimed at unlocking the potential of rollup technology and enabling interoperability between blockchains and the real world, is proud to announce a new strategic partnership with Enjinstarter, an innovative launchpad, incubator, and advisory for Web3 gaming, entertainment, and metaverse projects. This strategic partnership is committed to bolstering the development and advancement of the Web3 ecosystem.

Since its inception in 2021, Enjinstarter has supported over 70 companies and cultivated a diverse community of more than 200,000 across multiple social platforms. It provides unique market access in South East Asia, India, Turkey, Spain, North America, and Indonesia. Enjinstarter also runs a successful Web3 innovation consulting practice, guiding brands, large corporates, and Web2 companies to formulate effective Web3 strategies.

As part of the agreement, Enjinstarter will integrate Boba Network into its launchpad, introduce projects to the Boba Network ecosystem, and explore organizing gamer acquisition initiatives and tournaments. Concurrently, Enya Labs pledges to back the integration of Boba Network into the Enjinstarter launchpad, detail a comprehensive plan on ecosystem development and marketing, and potentially offer investment support and integration for appropriate games and projects. Both parties also plan to explore additional avenues for ecosystem development efforts and funding opportunities.

Boba Network's multichain Layer 2 solution enhances the compatibility and interoperability of blockchains with the real world. Its revolutionary HybridCompute™ is a groundbreaking innovation that marries siloed Web2 data with Web3 protocols, decentralized applications, and smart contracts. With just one line of code, access the existing Web2 systems and open the door to a realm of boundless opportunities.

Curtis Schlaufman, Head of Global Marketing at Enya Labs - Boba Network's Core Contributor, emphasizes, "Our partnership with Enjinstarter aligns perfectly with our vision. We are excited about the possibilities this partnership brings, especially for innovative developers and initiatives in the Boba ecosystem."

"In this partnership, Enjinstarter is committed to supporting projects to build on the Boba Network by providing our suite of services. Furthermore, we aim to introduce Boba Network as a potent chain to develop on, thus enhancing its reach and impact," says a representative from Enjinstarter.

About Enya Labs

Founded by a team of Stanford faculty and alumni, Enya Labs is an innovator of software frameworks specializing in distributed systems engineering and application development. The Company serves clients and organizations by helping their partners leverage their existing business to unlock new opportunities enabled by hybrid blockchain solutions.

Enya Labs is a core contributor to Boba Network, the only multichain layer-2 blockchain scaling solution and the only smart contract platform that enables Web3-Web2 interoperability. Boba Network improves the performance and lowers the transaction cost of base-layer blockchains by 40x-100x. Its unique Hybrid Compute technology allows smart contracts to call any off-chain API, giving developers the best of both the Web3 and the Web2 worlds to build the most compelling decentralized applications possible. 

For more information on Enya Labs and Boba Network visit: www.enya.ai, boba.network 

About Enjinstarter

Enjinstarter is a next-generation launchpad, incubator, and advisory platform for Web3 gaming, entertainment, and metaverse projects. With extensive experience and a robust community, Enjinstarter propels forward-thinking companies into the Web3 era.

ContactMark WienMark@marketacross.com

item.title: Smart Traders Think These 5 Coins Will Explode in 2023
item.dc:creator: Crypto Daily
item.description:
In the wake of a significant downturn in crypto prices, smart traders are keeping a close eye on five coins that they believe have the potential to rebound with a vengeance.

Uwerx, a blockchain-based platform, is on the verge of revolutionizing the freelance industry, fueling its explosive growth as it prepares to officially launch its platform.

Alongside Uwerx, Axie Infinity (AXS), Solana (SOL), Filecoin (FIL), and NEAR Protocol (NEAR) are dominating the market, captivating investors and enthusiasts alike.

Top 5 Coins Smart Traders Believe Will Make a Powerful Comeback 1. Axie Infinity (AXS): Collect, Breed, and Battle Digital Creatures for Cryptocurrency Rewards 2. Solana (SOL): Empowering Decentralized Applications with Lightning-Fast Speed 3. Uwerx (WERX): Revolutionizes Freelancing with Blockchain-Powered Platform 4. Filecoin (FIL): Unlocking the Potential of Decentralized Storage 5. NEAR Protocol (NEAR): Building the Future of Decentralized Applications Axie Infinity (AXS): Collect, Breed, and Battle Digital Creatures for Cryptocurrency Rewards

Embark on a captivating journey with Axie Infinity (AXS), a blockchain-based game that has taken the crypto and NFT world by storm. Developed by Sky Mavis, the revolutionary AxieInfinity (AXS) game allows players to immerse themselves in a world of digital creatures known as Axies.

With a current market price of $4.91 and a 24-hour trading volume of $34,462,068, Axie Infinity (AXS) is making waves in the gaming and crypto communities. Ranked #60 on CoinMarketCap, Axie Infinity (AXS) has a market cap of $576,398,354, showcasing its growing popularity and potential for lucrative opportunities.

Crypto analysts foresee a promising future for Axie Infinity (AXS), projecting a potential price surge to $10.25 by Q4 2024. The vibrant ecosystem, coupled with the rising demand for play-to-earn experiences, solidifies Axie Infinity (AXS) as an enticing investment opportunity.

Solana (SOL): Empowering Decentralized Applications with Lightning-Fast Speed

Discover Solana (SOL), a decentralized blockchain platform revolutionizing the world of decentralized applications (DApps) with its lightning-fast and scalable infrastructure.

With an impressive block time of just 400 milliseconds, Solana (SOL) stands out by handling thousands of transactions per second, ensuring efficient and seamless user experiences.

At the time of this writing, the trading price of Solana (SOL) is $15.28, and the project boasts a market cap of $5,983,233,560. Analysts predict a bright future for Solana (SOL), with projections suggesting a potential price of $28.40 by Q4 2024.

Filecoin (FIL): Unlocking the Potential of Decentralized Storage

Experience the revolution of decentralized storage and blockchain gaming with Filecoin (FIL), a pioneering project set to capitalize on the rising demand for non-fungible tokens (NFTs) and secure data storage.

With a current price of $3.53 and a 24-hour trading volume of $119,555,393, Filecoin (FIL) is making significant strides. Ranked #32 on CoinMarketCap, it boasts a market cap of $1,516,427,073.

Experts anticipate a bright future for Filecoin (FIL), projecting a potential price surge to $7.35 by Q4 2024. The growth in blockchain gaming, the adoption of NFTs, and the increasing need for decentralized storage all contribute to the bullish outlook.

Despite regulatory challenges and rumors, investor interest in Filecoin (FIL) remains resilient.

NEAR Protocol (NEAR) Price Prediction

Discover the potential of NEAR Protocol (NEAR), an advanced blockchain platform that aims to transform the development and distribution of decentralized applications (DApps) and promote a more inclusive web ecosystem.

NEAR Protocol (NEAR) introduces a Blockchain Operating System (BOS) that empowers developers to build innovative apps using familiar tools and programming languages like JavaScript.

With a current price of $1.20 and a 24-hour trading volume of $54,077,013, NEAR Protocol (NEAR) is steadily gaining traction. Ranked #39 on CoinMarketCap, it boasts a live market cap of $1,094,399,864.

Crypto analysts foresee an optimistic future for NEAR Protocol (NEAR), projecting a potential price surge to $10.25 by Q4 2024. This projection is fueled by NEAR Protocol (NEAR)'s commitment to driving innovation and its potential to capture a significant share of the burgeoning dApp market.

Uwerx (WERX) Revolutionizes Freelancing with Blockchain-Powered Platform

Uwerx, the pioneering freelance platform powered by blockchain technology, is committed to revolutionizing the freelance industry. With a clear vision for the future, Uwerx has successfully implemented groundbreaking campaigns and policies that prioritize user satisfaction.

One significant development is the introduction of the Uwerx Vault, which allows users to stake tokens and earn rewards. This innovative feature demonstrates the team's unwavering commitment to security, as evidenced by audits from industry-leading firms such as SolidProofand InterFi. Additionally, Uwerx ensures decentralization by adjusting the 25-year lock period for liquidity.

To achieve true decentralization, Uwerx's developers have renounced their claim to the smart contracts upon listing on centralized exchanges. This bold move underscores Uwerx's dedication to transparency and creating a platform driven by the community.

Uwerx has achieved notable milestones, such as its listing on CoinSniper and the upcoming listing on Uniswap on August 1st. These listings greatly enhance Uwerx's reach and liquidity, attracting a vibrant community with over 5,500 sign-ups, 1,600 Twitter followers, and 1,600 Telegram members.

Uwerx (WERX) Presale Enters Stage Five with Strong Market Potential

As Uwerx enters stage five of its presale, the platform aims to exceed expectations by catering to the growing demand in the freelance market. With a rapidly expanding user base and strong market interest, the Uwerx team has adjusted token allocations to ensure fairness and meet the increasing demand.

Currently priced at $0.041, industry analysts predict that Uwerx has the potential to reach $2.6 by Q4 2023, offering investors attractive returns. Seize this opportunity during the presale, where all purchases come with a generous 15% bonus.

Responding to community feedback and the rapid progress of the presale, the Uwerx team has made necessary adjustments to token allocations to ensure an equitable distribution. Consequently, the launch price has been revised to a range of $0.095 to $0.115, reflecting the project's undeniable success.

Uwerx (WERX) Alpha Version Unveiled - Test, Provide Feedback, and Engage

The much-awaited Alpha Version of the Uwerx platform has been unveiled, introducing the landing page, sign-in/sign-up pages, and more. Users have the opportunity to shape the future of Uwerx by actively participating in the Alpha Platform and offering valuable feedback. This input plays a crucial role in driving the continuous improvement and evolution of the platform.

Excitingly, the Uwerx team has planned regular feature releases on a weekly or bi-weekly basis, bringing users closer to the Beta version. Users are encouraged to test the platform and provide valuable feedback through the designated feedback email, feedback@uwerx.network.

In an effort to ensure transparency and user engagement, 92.8% of the Uwerx community has approved a Test Airdrop. This Airdrop will validate user wallet addresses and will take place before the presale concludes, further strengthening the platform's commitment to transparency.

Following the conclusion of the presale, Uwerx will commence the distribution of tokens through a fair and controlled release strategy over a 6-week vesting period. This meticulous approach guarantees gradual token allocation to holders, fostering stability and sustainable growth within the thriving Uwerx ecosystem.

Embark on Uwerx's revolutionary journey today and enjoy a 15% bonus on your token acquisitions. Join the platform set to redefine the freelance industry and empower users through blockchain technology.

Presale: invest.uwerx.network

Telegram: https://t.me/uwerx_network

Twitter: https://twitter.com/uwerx_network

Website: https://www.uwerx.network/

Disclaimer: This is a sponsored press release and is for informational purposes only. It does not reflect the views of Crypto Daily, nor is it intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, or financial advice.

item.title: AppleSwap: The All-In-One AI Tech Platform for Your Crypto Needs
item.dc:creator: Adrian Barkley
item.description:
AppleSwap could be your all-in-one crypto platform powered by AI technology to swap, sell, trade cryptocurrencies, or farm for rewards. Using AI Technology, AppleSwap takes pride in being the pioneering cryptocurrency exchange combining the best of both worlds: a CEX-DEX hybrid platform. 

The AppleSwap team is devoted to making crypto and blockchain accessible to everyone, whether pros or newbies. They utilize the power of artificial intelligence, integrating an extensive range of spot and future markets, comprehensive trading services, and a thriving ecosystem.

AppleSwap.ai: Your AI Partner for Your Crypto Needs

Appleswap.ai is a decentralized derivatives trading protocol where users can enjoy a smooth trading experience while connecting to Appleswap with just one click through their decentralized wallets.  

Also, AppleSwap wishes to gather the crypto community together to offer a more user-friendly platform that enhances privacy. There is no need to complete sign-up procedures; you just connect your crypto wallet and are ready to start trading.

Be sure to follow them on Twitter, check the Telegram channel for future announcements, and join their growing crypto community on Reddit.

All in one place with AppleSwap.ai

AppleSwap strongly believes in the immense potential of AI and blockchain technology and is dedicated to democratizing the use of cryptocurrencies. Investing and speculating in crypto assets can be complex and intimidating for many, but here comes AppleSwaps vision: creating a user-friendly platform that makes this revolutionary technology accessible to everyone, regardless of their technical expertise. 

Comprised of individuals with extraordinary values, AppleSwap works tirelessly to develop a simple and intuitive platform where users can effortlessly buy, sell, hold, and speculate on crypto assets.

Benefit from the Top Advantages of Appleswap

1. AI Technology:  Provide users with a secure and seamless trading experience on Appleswap CEX and DEX, Optimizing the transactions and Reducing swap costs.

2. User-Friendly Interface:  Our platform is designed with simplicity, ensuring that everyone, regardless of their background or experience, can easily participate in cryptocurrency trading.

3. Top-Notch Security Measures: The security of your assets is our utmost priority. We employ robust measures, including two-factor authentication (2FA), to provide a safe environment for storing and trading cryptocurrencies.

4. Enhanced Privacy: No sign-up is required; connect your crypto wallet and start trading.

5. Reliable System Performance: Rest assured, knowing that our system is stable and reliable. We prioritize maintaining a functional platform, ensuring minimal downtime and uninterrupted trading activities.

24/7 Customer Support: Need assistance? Our dedicated support team is available 24/7. Our highly-trained professionals are committed to promptly resolving any issues or queries, ensuring your satisfaction and peace of mind.

Discover the Top AppleSwap Products

As mentioned, AppleSwaps integrates all your crypto actions in one comprehensive ecosystem so you can have more time to focus on your crypto investment strategy.

Trade easily using their low-fee and fast transaction interface and enjoy fast and seamless futures trading anytime, anywhere.

With AppleSwap, you can earn passive income and support the blockchain by staking your assets; moreover, you earn interest by providing liquidity to our pools and sharing in transaction fees.

Boost your returns with our high-yield farming options in community-run pools and enjoy the prizes you receive when you are in top traders with the highest trading volume.

About the AP tokenomics

According to the AP Tokenomic, the AP token is used for security, utility, and governance within the AppleSwaps environment. The AP token facilitates users' interaction with the environment and can potentially increase the token's value if there is a higher demand for using and purchasing more Tokens.

AP Token Allocation:

The total supply of AP Tokens is 100,000,000 is available, with no additional tokens to mint. Moreover,  61,000,000 AP tokens will be sold during the fair launch phase to establish an initial user base and attract investor interest.

30,487,800 AP Tokens will be used for liquidity and to increase user trading capabilities, and 7,192,2 AP Tokens will be used for the staking pool and farming for six months. 

Also, 100,000 AP will facilitate a crypto airdrop; the remaining 1,22% are already unlocked.

Moreover, AppleSwap is committed to buying back AP Tokens from swap fees: 50% of the fees are committed to buying back AP Tokens from the market and burning them, thus reducing the supply of AP Tokens in the market and creating a potential for token holders to experience price appreciation.

It is essential to mention that the founders do not hold any AP Tokens. Thus, they can instill trust and transparency within the user community, as there is no potential for them to sell and create selling pressure on the token price.

Please check the official website for more details about AppleSwaps services, and the white paper offers more information on the tokenomics, such as the blockchain network, the smart contract, allocations, and many more.

AppleSwap Open AP FairLaunch on Pinksale

Pre-sale time: 19th - 21st, June, 2023

Appleswap.ai (AP) is gearing up for its listing on Bitget.com, scheduled for July 15th, 2023. As a unique CEX-DEX hybrid platform powered by AI technology, AP boasts various features and benefits. The platform takes pride in optimizing the bounce rate and ensuring a user-friendly experience for its traders. With intuitive interfaces and easy-to-understand features, beginners and experienced traders can navigate the platform seamlessly.

AP also offers a Trading Volume Leaderboard, allowing users to track and compare their performance with others on the platform. Privacy is a top priority on Appleswap.ai, with enhanced privacy measures to safeguard user data and information. 

Additionally, the platform aims to reduce transaction costs, making cryptocurrency trading and swapping more cost-effective for its users. With a strong focus on security, Appleswap.ai implements robust protocols to protect user funds and assets, ensuring a safe trading environment.

Total Supply: 100,000,000 AP;

Tokens For Presale: 61,000,000 AP;

Tokens For Liquidity: 30,487,800 AP and AppleSwap hold 0% of the total supply of 100 million AP;

Soft Cap: 10 BNB;

Listing On: Pancakeswap;

Liquidity Percent: 51%;

*More details you can find here.

Whether you're looking to swap cryptocurrencies, engage in future trading, provide liquidity, stake assets, or farm for rewards, Appleswap.ai has you covered. Its comprehensive suite of services caters to various trading needs, offering a one-stop solution for crypto enthusiasts.

As the listing on Bitget.com approaches, the excitement surrounding Appleswap.ai continues to grow, and users can anticipate a seamless and feature-rich trading experience on the platform.

AppleSwap could be your all-in-one crypto platform powered by AI technology to swap, sell, trade cryptocurrencies, or farm for rewards. Using AI Technology, AppleSwap takes pride in being the pioneering cryptocurrency exchange combining the best of both worlds: a CEX-DEX hybrid platform. 

The AppleSwap team is devoted to making crypto and blockchain accessible to everyone, whether pros or newbies. They utilize the power of artificial intelligence, integrating an extensive range of spot and future markets, comprehensive trading services, and a thriving ecosystem.

AppleSwap.ai: Your AI Partner for Your Crypto Needs

Appleswap.ai is a decentralized derivatives trading protocol where users can enjoy a smooth trading experience while connecting to Appleswap with just one click through their decentralized wallets.  

Also, AppleSwap wishes to gather the crypto community together to offer a more user-friendly platform that enhances privacy. There is no need to complete sign-up procedures; you just connect your crypto wallet and are ready to start trading.

Be sure to follow them on Twitter, check the Telegram channel for future announcements, and join their growing crypto community on Reddit.

All in one place with AppleSwap.ai

AppleSwap strongly believes in the immense potential of AI and blockchain technology and is dedicated to democratizing the use of cryptocurrencies. Investing and speculating in crypto assets can be complex and intimidating for many, but here comes AppleSwaps vision: creating a user-friendly platform that makes this revolutionary technology accessible to everyone, regardless of their technical expertise. 

Comprised of individuals with extraordinary values, AppleSwap works tirelessly to develop a simple and intuitive platform where users can effortlessly buy, sell, hold, and speculate on crypto assets.

Benefit from the Top Advantages of Appleswap

1. AI Technology:  Provide users with a secure and seamless trading experience on Appleswap CEX and DEX, Optimizing the transactions and Reducing swap costs.

2. User-Friendly Interface:  Our platform is designed with simplicity, ensuring that everyone, regardless of their background or experience, can easily participate in cryptocurrency trading.

3. Top-Notch Security Measures: The security of your assets is our utmost priority. We employ robust measures, including two-factor authentication (2FA), to provide a safe environment for storing and trading cryptocurrencies.

4. Enhanced Privacy: No sign-up is required; connect your crypto wallet and start trading.

5. Reliable System Performance: Rest assured, knowing that our system is stable and reliable. We prioritize maintaining a functional platform, ensuring minimal downtime and uninterrupted trading activities.

24/7 Customer Support: Need assistance? Our dedicated support team is available 24/7. Our highly-trained professionals are committed to promptly resolving any issues or queries, ensuring your satisfaction and peace of mind.

Discover the Top AppleSwap Products

As mentioned, AppleSwaps integrates all your crypto actions in one comprehensive ecosystem so you can have more time to focus on your crypto investment strategy.

Trade easily using their low-fee and fast transaction interface and enjoy fast and seamless futures trading anytime, anywhere.

With AppleSwap, you can earn passive income and support the blockchain by staking your assets; moreover, you earn interest by providing liquidity to our pools and sharing in transaction fees.

Boost your returns with our high-yield farming options in community-run pools and enjoy the prizes you receive when you are in top traders with the highest trading volume.

About the AP tokenomics

According to the AP Tokenomic, the AP token is used for security, utility, and governance within the AppleSwaps environment. The AP token facilitates users' interaction with the environment and can potentially increase the token's value if there is a higher demand for using and purchasing more Tokens.

AP Token Allocation:

The total supply of AP Tokens is 100,000,000 is available, with no additional tokens to mint. Moreover,  61,000,000 AP tokens will be sold during the fair launch phase to establish an initial user base and attract investor interest.

30,487,800 AP Tokens will be used for liquidity and to increase user trading capabilities, and 7,192,2 AP Tokens will be used for the staking pool and farming for six months. 

Also, 100,000 AP will facilitate a crypto airdrop; the remaining 1,22% are already unlocked.

Moreover, AppleSwap is committed to buying back AP Tokens from swap fees: 50% of the fees are committed to buying back AP Tokens from the market and burning them, thus reducing the supply of AP Tokens in the market and creating a potential for token holders to experience price appreciation.

It is essential to mention that the founders do not hold any AP Tokens. Thus, they can instill trust and transparency within the user community, as there is no potential for them to sell and create selling pressure on the token price.

Please check the official website for more details about AppleSwaps services, and the white paper offers more information on the tokenomics, such as the blockchain network, the smart contract, allocations, and many more.

AppleSwap Open AP FairLaunch on Pinksale

Pre-sale time: 19th - 21st, June, 2023

Appleswap.ai (AP) is gearing up for its listing on Bitget.com, scheduled for July 15th, 2023. As a unique CEX-DEX hybrid platform powered by AI technology, AP boasts various features and benefits. The platform takes pride in optimizing the bounce rate and ensuring a user-friendly experience for its traders. With intuitive interfaces and easy-to-understand features, beginners and experienced traders can navigate the platform seamlessly.

AP also offers a Trading Volume Leaderboard, allowing users to track and compare their performance with others on the platform. Privacy is a top priority on Appleswap.ai, with enhanced privacy measures to safeguard user data and information. 

Additionally, the platform aims to reduce transaction costs, making cryptocurrency trading and swapping more cost-effective for its users. With a strong focus on security, Appleswap.ai implements robust protocols to protect user funds and assets, ensuring a safe trading environment.

Total Supply: 100,000,000 AP;

Tokens For Presale: 61,000,000 AP;

Tokens For Liquidity: 30,487,800 AP and AppleSwap hold 0% of the total supply of 100 million AP;

Soft Cap: 10 BNB;

Listing On: Pancakeswap;

Liquidity Percent: 51%;

*More details you can find here.

Whether you're looking to swap cryptocurrencies, engage in future trading, provide liquidity, stake assets, or farm for rewards, Appleswap.ai has you covered. Its comprehensive suite of services caters to various trading needs, offering a one-stop solution for crypto enthusiasts.

As the listing on Bitget.com approaches, the excitement surrounding Appleswap.ai continues to grow, and users can anticipate a seamless and feature-rich trading experience on the platform.

item.title: Independent Reserve Eyes Expansion To Hongkong
item.dc:creator: Vince Dioquino
item.description:
The Sydney-based crypto exchange is eyeing an expansion to Hong Kong in the “next few months” according to an interview with Lasanka Perera, the CEO of its Singapore operations.

Having had a solid foundation in Singapore for the past decade, Perera says that the firm is now looking for other hubs and is currently applying for a license to operate in Hong Kong. Perera cited Hong Kong’s advantage as an “active financial hub with deep capital markets.”

Towards the end of October last year, the Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) enacted an overhaul on its crypto regulations which introduced tighter restrictions and discouraged retail trading. Perera commented on how these restrictions caused a significant drop in Independent Reserve’s business, forcing the exchange to focus more on wealth management and Web3 payment segments. Perera also notes the conservatism

Around the same time, Hong Kong announced an easing up on its regulations, culminating in the announcement just last March of an open regulatory framework which took effect this June. This new framework encouraged the adoption of digital assets while protecting its users from crises in the sector and is expected to foster the development and growth of the digital asset market.

Regulatory Shifts Impacting Market Strategies

The stricter regulatory environment imposed by the Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) in October last year has served as a critical inflection point for crypto firms like Independent Reserve. The introduction of tighter constraints on cryptocurrency trading, particularly discouraging retail trading, had a significant impact on Independent Reserve's business, causing a marked drop in trading activity.

In contrast, Hong Kong has welcomed digital assets with more liberal regulatory practices, a move that Independent Reserve sees as an opportunity for expansion. Hong Kong's open regulatory framework, enacted this June, aims to foster digital asset adoption while providing user protection. This proactive, balanced approach to digital asset regulation makes Hong Kong an attractive market for crypto companies seeking a more welcoming regulatory climate.

Eyeing Expansion Beyond Asia

Independent Reserve's expansion strategy does not stop in Asia. The firm is also setting sights further afield, notably towards Dubai. Perera highlights that stepping into Dubai would potentially open up pathways to affluent European markets and capital. This strategic move underscores the firm's ambition to become a truly global player in the digital asset space.

However, the key to successful market entry hinges on Dubai adopting sensible and supportive regulations for crypto exchanges. Independent Reserve's leadership is watching regulatory developments closely as they form the backbone of their growth strategy. As the firm plans its next steps, observers are waiting to see how these international expansions will reshape the broader crypto landscape.

Hong Kong is well on its way to becoming a crypto hub in Southeast Asia and observers will take note of the way this relates to China’s crypto policies as a whole; Perera himself has noted how Hong Kong is “the doorway to [greater] China”. And of course, one will have to take note how this squares with the especially dire state of the cryptocurrency sector in the United States.

Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice.

item.title: Twitter Suspends AI Bot Citing Crypto Scam Allegation
item.dc:creator: Vince Dioquino
item.description:
In a recent uproar within the crypto Twitter community, the popular AI bot "Explain This Bob" found its account suspended. This action followed an accusation by Tesla CEO Elon Musk, who identified it as a "scam crypto account."

Interestingly, the bot was intrinsically linked to the ERC-20 memecoin, Bob Token (BOB), whose price spiraled downward by over 30% in the aftermath of the suspension, clearly indicating the real-world repercussions of such allegations.

Suspension of 'Explain This Bob' Sparks Controversy

"Explain This Bob," an AI-powered bot engineered by Prabhu Biswal from India, employed OpenAI’s GPT-4 model to decipher and respond to tweets associated with its account. Garnering over 400,000 followers before its suspension, the bot held substantial influence within the platform. Bob Token, launched in April and directly connected with the bot, even caught the attention of Musk earlier on, who had tweeted, “I love Bob.”

Twitter's decision to spare the Bob Token's account while suspending the bot reveals a discernible separation between the suspected irregularities associated with the bot and the perceived legitimacy of the linked crypto token. Following the suspension, the Bob Token project team responded with a humorous meme depicting Musk keeping an eye on a distressed “Bob” in prison.

The subsequent rallying of the Twitter community behind the Bob Token, with widespread circulation of the hashtag “FREEBOB”, testifies to the bot's popularity. Supporters have vociferously argued against BOB being labelled a scam coin, asserting that the token's launch was conducted fairly, it operates on a fully decentralized mechanism, and features a 0% tax system.

Twitter and Crypto: A Complex Duo

Twitter's controversial suspension of 'Explain This Bob' is a snapshot of the platform's intricate dance with the world of cryptocurrencies. Serving as an influential social media platform, Twitter wields a strong hand in sculpting the crypto narrative and can sway token values significantly. This is apparent from the instant depreciation of the Bob Token's value following the suspension of the associated bot.

Twitter's association with cryptocurrencies runs deep, with ex-CEO Jack Dorsey being an outspoken Bitcoin advocate, and the platform recently integrating Bitcoin as a tipping feature. Yet, this association has faced hurdles, with the platform being leveraged for spreading misinformation, initiating scams, and organizing 'pump and dump' schemes. Striking a balance between promoting discussions around cryptocurrencies and ensuring user safety from potential scams has therefore become a daunting task for Twitter.

As of the last available data in September 2021, Twitter boasts over 330 million active users, with a significant portion being active participants in the crypto community. This statistic reflects the platform's integral role in driving substantial movements within cryptocurrency markets, especially when high-profile figures like Elon Musk are involved.

Twitter's relationship with cryptocurrencies is indeed a delicate dance. While the platform presents an indispensable medium for disseminating crypto-related news and fostering dialogue, it also grapples with ensuring its user base remains safeguarded from potential scams and misinformation. In this sense, the crypto industry also needs to acknowledge the role of social media platforms such as Twitter is likely to become increasingly complex and significant.

Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice.

item.title: Updates On BlackRock's Spot BTC ETF, Crypto Daily TV 19/6/2023
item.dc:creator: Amara Khatri
item.description:
In Todays Headline TV CryptoDaily News:

Binance issues cease and desist notice to "Binance Nigeria Limited"

Binance has issued a cease and desist order to “Binance Nigeria Limited”, Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao said in a tweet on Sunday, calling the Nigerian company a “scammer entity”.

Crypto exchange Binance avoids disaster in the US

Accused of fraud, the largest cryptocurrency exchange has reached an agreement with the U.S Securities and Exchange Commission which allows it to continue to operate for the time being in the United States.

BlackRock to launch BTC spot ETF

Bitcoin market sentiment showed a modest improvement late last week as news emerged that the world’s largest asset manager, BlackRock, had filed to launch a Bitcoin spot price exchange-traded fund. While still not allowed in the United States, a spot ETF from a stalwart entity such as BlackRock should have better chances of breaking the legal impasse.

BTC/USD saw a minor dip of 0.1% in the last session.

The Bitcoin-Dollar pair made a minor downwards correction in the last session, dropping 0.1%. According to the Stochastic-RSI, we are in an overbought market. Support is at 25921.6667 and resistance at 27095.6667.

The Stochastic-RSI is signalling an overbought market.

The Ethereum-Dollar pair gained a moderate 0.1% in the last session.

The Ethereum-Dollar pair saw a minor rise of 0.1% in the last session. The Stochastic indicator is giving a positive signal. Support is at 1685.471 and resistance at 1785.351.

The Stochastic indicator is currently in positive territory.

XRP/USD exploded 2.3% in the last session.

The Ripple-Dollar pair exploded 2.3% in the last session. The RSI is giving a negative signal. Support is at 0.4617 and resistance at 0.4954.

The RSI is currently in negative territory.

LTC/USD gained 0.6% in the last session.

The last session saw Litecoin rise 0.6% against the Dollar. The MACD is giving a negative signal. Support is at 74.7567 and resistance at 78.8167.

The MACD is giving a negative signal.

Daily Economic Calendar:

US NAHB Housing Market Index

The NAHB Housing Market Index presents home sales and expected buildings in the future indicating housing market trends. The US NAHB Housing Market Index will be released at 14:00 GMT, the Portuguese Current Account Balance at 10:00 GMT, Germany's German Buba Monthly Report at 10:00 GMT.

PT Current Account Balance

The Current Account measures net flow of current transactions, including goods, services and interest payments into and out of the local economy.

DE Buba Monthly Report

The German Buba Monthly Report, released by the Deutsche Bundesbank, contains relevant articles, speeches, statistical tables, and provides detailed analysis of current and future economic conditions.

HK Unemployment Rate

The Unemployment Rate measures the percentage of unemployed people in the country. A high percentage indicates weakness in the labor market. Hong Kong's Unemployment rate will be released at 08:30 GMT, Australia's RBA Meeting Minutes at 01:30 GMT, the US Housing Starts at 12:30 GMT.

AU RBA Meeting Minutes

The minutes of the Reserve Bank of Australia meetings give a full account of the policy discussion, including differences of view. They also record the votes of the individual members of the Committee.

US Housing Starts

The Housing Starts captures how many new single-family homes or buildings were constructed. It is a key indicator of the housing market.

Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice.

item.title: 'Ethscriptions' Ordinals Arrive On Ethereum
item.dc:creator: Vince Dioquino
item.description:
Ethereum users are being given a fresh way to create nonfungible tokens (NFTs) and other digital assets on the blockchain following the launch of a new protocol called "Ethscriptions."

Launched on June 17 by music website Genius.com's co-founder Tom Lehman, Ethscriptions aims to revolutionize Ethereum-based digital asset creation and was quickly met with a high degree of enthusiasm, generating almost 30,000 Ethscriptions within the first 18 hours.

Taking inspiration from the popular Bitcoin (BTC) Ordinals protocol — where assets are known as “inscriptions” — Ethscriptions promises to enhance the way digital assets are minted on the Ethereum network.

The Protocol: Leveraging Ethereum's Calldata for Improved Minting

Lehman, who is also known by the pseudonym Middlemarch on Twitter, declared the project a "huge success." Ethscriptions employs Ethereum's "calldata," which refers to the data held within a smart contract, to allow for a "cheaper" and "more decentralized" minting process compared to conventional smart contract-based methods.

At present, the protocol limits users to image-only inscriptions, but Lehman assures that Ethscriptions will accommodate different file types in the future. Current protocol specifications permit users to "ethscribe" any image provided it's less than 96 kilobytes in size.

Lehman’s first project on the Ethscriptions protocol, the "Ethereum Punks," witnessed a significantly positive response from the community. All 10,000 assets were claimed almost instantaneously, reinforcing the positive acceptance of the protocol by the community.

Challenges and Potential: Navigating the Ethereum Ecosystem

Despite the initial success, the project's launch caused so much user activity that the API interface for the official Ethscriptions website temporarily crashed, indicating possible infrastructure challenges.

Given the existing infrastructure that enables the creation of NFTs and other digital assets on the Ethereum network, it remains uncertain whether Ethscriptions will achieve the same level of popularity as Bitcoin Ordinals. Within six months, the total number of Ordinals inscribed on Bitcoin skyrocketed from zero to 10 million, driven primarily by users' fascination with minting assets and the novelty of minting entirely new tokens through the BRC-20 token standard on the Bitcoin network.

The launch of the Ethscriptions protocol on Ethereum presents a significant development for digital asset creation on the blockchain. The Ethereum ecosystem continues to evolve and innovate, and it becomes clearer over this period that initiatives like Ethscriptions could potentially introduce new dynamics and possibilities. While the immediate impact is promising, the long-term success of this novel approach to asset creation remains to be seen.

Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice.

item.title: Poliant.com Releases Follow the Whale, the First AI Pool in the Crypto Market
item.dc:creator: Crypto Daily
item.description:
Poliant, ai private club designed especially for crypto users, has recently launched Follow the Whale, its main product. Follow the Whale is a platform that will significantly contribute to the crypto space by analyzing data and predicting important updates in the market. 

A Game Changer for the Crypto Space

Poliant, a yearly founded crypto project, has just developed and launched its main product, Follow the Whale (FTWP). Follow the Whale Pool is an exclusive platform developed with the main goal of analyzing terabytes of data per second in order to anticipate crucial information. 

Follow the Whale will be able to identify when a whale enters or exits the market of a cryptocurrency. The platform will achieve that by accessing large quantities of data in a very short time. The data will come from the market and exchanges in the form of data packages. 

By analyzing such data, Poliant and Follow the Whale aim to offer users valuable information, as well as provide additional information to AI (Artificial Intelligence) software, in order to help it act in the best way possible. 

Basically, Follow the Whale will have one job - to follow the whale’s signal. When a whale exit  the market, the pool of Follow the Whale will go “Short”, while when a new whale enters the market, the system will go “Buy”. Thanks to this system, the team behind Follow the Whale can use whales’ market movements to generate rewards. 

Follow the Whale can indeed contribute to the well-functioning of the crypto space, considering that it anticipates some events that can truly affect the crypto market. Besides, Poliant’s focus on helping the AI industry can indeed increase the popularity of the crypto project and its main product, considering that artificial intelligence is fastly developing and gaining remarkable popularity with each day that passes. 

About Poliant 

Poliant is a private club developed for crypto users where entrepreneurs and freelancers can access and exchange know-how through various products and services. In other words, Poliant aims to become a common space where users can meet and discuss various crypto-related subjects and not only. Besides, Poliant aims to allow users to access exclusive services and products only available to those who registered on the platform and constantly contribute to its development.

Poliant launched recently and describes itself as a Ce-DeFi Club (Centralized-Decentralized Club). The centralized part of the project is linked to various companies that can check concepts such as KYC and AML procedures, software integration, token issuing, and others. 

On the other hand, the decentralized part of Poliant is correlated with token liquidity, POLI, xPOLI, rewards, management, and voting. Thus, Poliant users can contribute to the platform's processes by submitting their votes in the “DAO Voting” section. 

Poliant is a user-centered and user-friendly platform that is constantly focusing on growing its community and maintaining its users incentivized and intrigued by the concepts developed by the team. When it comes to its users, Poliant is working to provide a unique opportunity for crypto enthusiasts by allowing them to be part of the digital economy and earn various rewards for doing so. 

Stay Tuned

To learn more about Poliant, Follow the Whale, and the latest updates of the crypto project, do not hesitate to access the official Poliant website. You can also follow Poliant on Twitter, LinkedIn, Medium, Telegram, YouTube, Instagram, Linktree, and Facebook.

item.content:encoded:
Poliant, ai private club designed especially for crypto users, has recently launched Follow the Whale, its main product. Follow the Whale is a platform that will significantly contribute to the crypto space by analyzing data and predicting important updates in the market. 

A Game Changer for the Crypto Space

Poliant, a yearly founded crypto project, has just developed and launched its main product, Follow the Whale (FTWP). Follow the Whale Pool is an exclusive platform developed with the main goal of analyzing terabytes of data per second in order to anticipate crucial information. 

Follow the Whale will be able to identify when a whale enters or exits the market of a cryptocurrency. The platform will achieve that by accessing large quantities of data in a very short time. The data will come from the market and exchanges in the form of data packages. 

By analyzing such data, Poliant and Follow the Whale aim to offer users valuable information, as well as provide additional information to AI (Artificial Intelligence) software, in order to help it act in the best way possible. 

Basically, Follow the Whale will have one job - to follow the whale’s signal. When a whale exit  the market, the pool of Follow the Whale will go “Short”, while when a new whale enters the market, the system will go “Buy”. Thanks to this system, the team behind Follow the Whale can use whales’ market movements to generate rewards. 

Follow the Whale can indeed contribute to the well-functioning of the crypto space, considering that it anticipates some events that can truly affect the crypto market. Besides, Poliant’s focus on helping the AI industry can indeed increase the popularity of the crypto project and its main product, considering that artificial intelligence is fastly developing and gaining remarkable popularity with each day that passes.

Poliant is a private club developed for crypto users where entrepreneurs and freelancers can access and exchange know-how through various products and services. item.title: Bitcoin is the way out of a bizarre monetary system
item.dc:creator: Laurie Dunn
item.description:
How the financial system works is bizarre beyond belief. Bitcoin is the life raft that provides unseizable wealth.

How does one explain this monetary system?

If an alien landed on earth and asked how the financial system worked, there is probably no economist who would be able to explain how such a complex and outlandish system actually functions.

The heart of the world’s financial system is arguably the United States, and the Federal Reserve Bank. A bank that isn’t federal and has no reserves. In fact, the Federal Reserve is a private bank, with all the big US banks helping to run it and being among the shareholders.

The alien might ask how on earth, or even in the galaxy, can a private bank run the financial affairs of the most powerful country in the world, and in turn influence the entire global monetary and banking system?

The answer might be that it just kind of happened. Edward Griffin's “The creature from Jekyll Island” does the best job in telling the story of how a group of extremely powerful bankers and politicians travelled to a little frequented destination and held a secret meeting on setting up a central bank with which to control the country’s money.

They were successful beyond belief and the bank endures to this day, with the world’s financial markets completely in thrall whenever the Chairman of the Federal Reserve makes his utterances on what the central bank will do next.

How has the system endured?

Some might say that what it has already done is enough, as when President Nixon announced back in 1971 that the dollar would be removed from its gold backing, allowing the country to print currency with almost no restraint ever since then.

The alien could then ask how the dollar was able to keep its purchasing power, to say nothing of all the world’s fiat currencies which were tied to it. Also, hard assets such as gold - wouldn’t they rocket to the heavens?

The answer would be that the dollar has lost 99% of its purchasing power since it was established in 1914, just after the creation of the Federal Reserve Bank. 

Gold has kept its purchasing power, as it has done throughout the history of the world and just continues to go up against the dollar despite the massive amount of manipulation that goes on in the paper futures exchanges such as the COMEX.

Finally the alien may ask how the population of the US and that of other countries hasn’t risen up to protest the theft of purchasing power by the banks? The answer would be that the population is kept from discussing or hearing about how the financial system works, and this dearth of knowledge is throughout schools, colleges, and universities.

How the story ends well

However, the good news that could be told to the alien is that a decentralised hard money system has managed to grow under the radar of those in charge of the monetary system. It has spread across the world to become the most powerful and secure computer network that the world has ever seen.

Its name is Bitcoin, and it provides wealth that cannot be taken away from the holder, not by force, nor by manipulation of central banks that drive the world’s middle classes into poverty.

This is a story that can end well, and will perhaps leave the alien not feeling as sorry for us. Here is a world where an evil monetary system prevails, but where a gift in the form of Bitcoin can provide an exit out of the slavery that fiat currencies inflict.

Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice.

item.title: ChainGPT Token ($CGPT) is Launching on Ethereum - Bridging Web3 AI
item.dc:creator: Crypto Daily
item.description:
Broadening its horizons and looking to increase its on-chain footprint, ChainGPT has begun its interchain movement by bridging the $CGPT token to the Ethereum Network.

Enabled through a partnership with ChainPort, KuCoin, BitGet, and other top-tier Web3 partners, ChainGPT has developed a decentralized bi-directional bridge between the Binance Smart Chain and Ethereum for the $CGPT token. Now users will be able to transfer their $CGPT to and from the ETH and BNB/BSC networks seamlessly.

With the implementation of the bridge, the $CGPT token’s on-chain presence expands, gaining access to the robust and vibrant ecology of the Ethereum network. Integrations into many of the world's leading DEFI protocols, the opening of token pools on DEXs, and the provision of added trading pairs against a broader segment of popular tokens becomes possible.

What is $CGPT?

At its core, $CGPT is enabling a decentralized economy for AI services. As the native token of the ChainGPT ecosystem, $CGPT serves the dual functions of a utility and governance tool. Its utility purpose is to provide access to a full suite of AI-powered Web3 tooling from NFT minting and community management to smart contract auditing and creation to launchpad tiering and beyond. Its governance function relates to the role of $CGPT in distributing ownership rights over the platform throughout its community members and giving them the opportunity to help steer the direction of the project’s development. View the ChainGPT DAO here.

Where will the ERC-20 version of $CGPT be supported?

ChainGPT has been in communications with a multitude of exchanges that would be able to provide support immediately after instantiation. At this time, Kucoin, BitGet, and ByBit have confirmed support with a few select other major exchanges signaling their willingness.

On the front of decentralized venues for support, the most popular DEX in the world, UniSwap, will have a $CGPT token pool opened to provide instant listing and liquidity on Ethereum.

With the help of ChainPort, $CGPT’s presence on major crypto directories and analytics portals including CoinGecko and Etherscan has been expedited.

Bridge Specifications

üìÜ Launch Date: June 19th, 2023üïõ Launch time: 10AM EST / 2PM UTC

Bridge Partner: ChainPort (app.chainport.io)Exchanges: Uniswap, KuCoin, BitGet, GateioMarket Makers: KaironLabs & CLS

$CGPT Contract Address on Ethereum:0x25931894a86d47441213199621f1f2994e1c39aa

$CGPT Contract Address on Binance Smart Chain:0x9840652DC04fb9db2C43853633f0F62BE6f00f98

CoinMarketCap: https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/chaingpt/ DexCheck: https://dexcheck.io/app/bsc/chart/0xcfe847aae922cbe3dcbba61dbb1ed97d2124d322 

View the DAO proposal for more information about the bridging, here.

About ChainGPT

ChainGPT is the leading provider of AI-powered Infrastructure for the crypto, blockchain, and Web3 industry. From automated smart contract generation and auditing, to autonomous community management, advanced Web3 AI chatbot, AI-powered news aggregation, and NFT generation, ChainGPT is the most sophisticated, end-to-end AI solution on the market.

 

Contact Person(s): Jake Wallace / Cameron French / Ilan Rakhmanov Contact Email(s): jacob@chaingpt.org / cameron@chaingpt.org / ceo@chaingpt.org

—> To learn more about ChainGPT visit the official ChainGPT.org website

—> For all inquiries, please contact info@chaingpt.org

Disclaimer: This is a sponsored press release and is for informational purposes only. It does not reflect the views of Crypto Daily, nor is it intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, or financial advice.
